Play Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance Online – GBA Classic

Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance takes the explosive puzzle-action gameplay of the classic Bomberman series and adds new twists, creatures, and challenges. After being shrunk by the evil Mujoe and his Hige Hige Bandits, Bomberman must battle through dozens of levels filled with traps, enemies, and puzzles to restore his normal size.

What is Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance?

Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance is one of two companion games released for the Game Boy Advance—the other being Red Advance. Players guide Bomberman through over 80 stages filled with strategic bombing puzzles and collectible Charaboms, small creatures that can be raised and used in battles or to unlock new areas.

How to Play Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance

  • Plant Bombs: Use bombs to defeat enemies and break obstacles.
  • Collect Charaboms: Find and train these creatures to help in special missions.
  • Clear Levels: Complete puzzles and defeat bosses to advance.
  • Link with Red Advance: Connect to the Red version to unlock 20 exclusive stages.
  • Multiplayer Battle: Enjoy 4-player battles via link cable.

Why Play Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance Online?

Play Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance unblocked in your browser and relive this GBA classic. Enjoy strategic bombing gameplay, unique Charabom collecting, and cooperative or competitive multiplayer—all without downloads or emulators.

Key Features

  • 80+ Action-Packed Levels: Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and rescue allies.
  • Charabom System: Collect, raise, and battle creatures to enhance gameplay.
  • Link Functionality: Unlock hidden content when connected with Red Advance.
  • Classic Bomberman Gameplay: Timed explosions and strategic combat.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Up to 4 players can battle using GBA link cables.
